price: On that day, no intercession will be of any use except to whom the Most Compassionate gave permission and approved his word.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
